reviewText: Product arrived promptly and as described. Works perfectly.
I play by ear and this is a great method to help me learn the fiddle.
This teaches from the very basics.  It is a great place to start.  No reading music, no tabs to learn, just learning to play the fiddle.
This is a great DVD on learning to play the fiddle. I really love the easy learning method used in this DVD and recommend it to any who wants to start playing the fiddle on their own.
